IMF says making 'excellent progress' in talks with EgyptThere was "excellent progress" in talks with Egypt to enhance its IMF loan program, and "comprehensive support" was needed to help the country deal with pressures posed by refugees from the war in Gaza, the International Monetary Fund said on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 17:20:57 GMT CCYGRVYFVVPPLGVYPE2HSSS2DY https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/imf-says-making-excellent-progress-talks-with-egypt-2024-02-22/Andrea Shalal世界非洲
IMF says Ukraine needs 'timely support' from US, other donorsThe International Monetary Fund on Thursday said that "timely support" for Ukraine was needed from the United States and other international donors to ensure the country's fiscal viability as it enters a third year battling Russia's invasion. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 17:18:01 GMT FFIEZOIWKRP7JCUKKVOJSKELYY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/imf-says-ukraine-needs-timely-support-us-other-donors-2024-02-22/David Lawder世界欧洲
Europol dismantles big migrant smuggling network in Europe, arrests 19One of the biggest migrant smuggling networks across the English channel was dismantled with the arrest of 19 people in Germany, including the leader and four main organisers, Europol said on Thursday following a large-scale operation conducted with German, French and Belgian police. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 17:02:15 GMT 3NSXYU2UH5MU7DJZVKUBU2FPE4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/europol-dismantles-big-migrant-smuggling-network-europe-arrests-19-2024-02-22/Reuters世界欧洲
WHO plans more evacuations from Gaza hospital as bodies reportedly decomposeThe World Health Organization aims to evacuate more of the roughly 140 patients stranded in Gaza's Nasser hospital, where Palestinian officials said bodies of dead patients had begun to decompose amid power cuts and fighting. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:53:40 GMT SKT4HF57BFL6PHZQGFKF6NAOJI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/who-plans-more-evacuations-gaza-hospital-bodies-reportedly-decompose-2024-02-22/Aidan Lewis世界中东
Libya factions remain on Tripoli streets as withdrawal plan announcedMajor armed factions remained visible on the streets of Libya's capital Tripoli on Thursday after the Government of National Unity said they had agreed to withdraw from checkpoints and stop patrols over the coming weeks. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:48:46 GMT DMETJV24IVNNHJQGYZ3R7LZVHU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/libya-factions-remain-tripoli-streets-withdrawal-plan-announced-2024-02-22/Reuters世界非洲
Putin on Biden's 'crazy SOB' remark: shows why he is preferable as U.S presidentRussian President Vladimir Putin said on Thursday that Joe Biden's "crazy SOB" remark showed why the Kremlin felt that for Russia, Biden would be a preferable future U.S. president to Donald Trump. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:42:36 GMT K4OCYLWEXVOBBK6O7MQYNC22CY https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-bidens-crazy-sob-remark-shows-why-he-is-preferable-us-president-2024-02-22/Reuters世界
Russian, Turkish foreign ministers discuss Gaza at G20, Turkish source saysTurkish Foreign Minister Hakan Fidan and Russian counterpart Sergei Lavrov on Thursday discussed "the dire humanitarian situation in Gaza" and steps that could be taken on it at the G20 in Rio de Janeiro, a Turkish diplomatic source said. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:37:31 GMT NHCRETJ5PNMJLB6AYTBFL6CH2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russian-turkish-foreign-ministers-discuss-gaza-g20-turkish-source-says-2024-02-22/Reuters世界
Navalny's mother accuses Russian investigators of planning to bury him in secretAlexei Navalny's mother Lyudmila accused Russian investigators on Thursday of planning to bury her son in secret without a funeral, and said she would not agree to it. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:32:07 GMT HXLYKMLHMNJFHCIXTPZ6EUBFW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalnys-mother-accuses- Russian-investigators-trying-stage-secret-funeral-2024-02-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Navalny's team says death certificate says he died of natural causesKremlin critic Alexei Navalny's team said on X on Thursday that the opposition politician's death certificate says he died of natural causes. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:28:03 GMT D3ATGPI2VJL2BDM3LQX5GTKCM4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/navalnys-team-says-death-certificate-says-he-died-natural-causes-2024-02-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Canadian white nationalist who killed Muslim family gets life sentence -mediaA Canadian white nationalist who deliberately ran over and killed four members of a Muslim family in 2021 was given a life sentence on Thursday with no chance of parole for 25 years, domestic media reported. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:27:43 GMT LVUVNCORO5NA7I5YYRAJ2ENIKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/judicial-first-canada-judge-says-truck-attacker-comfilled-error-2024-02-22/David Ljunggren, Ismail Shakil世界美洲
EU sees G20 consensus on two-state solution for Israel-Palestinian conflictForeign ministers at the G20 group of nations meeting in Brazil were of one opinion on the need for a two-state solution as the only path to peace in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict, European Union foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said on Thursday. Thu, 22 Feb 2024 16:25:49 GMT POJ72EKF7JIHLFTZ74OLUML3RU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/eu-sees-g20-consensus-two-state-solution-israel-palestinian-conflict-2024-02-22/Reuters世界中东
